text: Ara tomara kache jijnesa kare hayeya (rtu) samparke. Bale da'o, eta asuci. Kaje'i tomara hayeya abasthaya strigamana theke birata thaka. Takhana paryanta tadera nikatabarti habe na, yataksana na tara pabitra haye yaya. Yakhana uttama rupe parisud'dha haye yabe, takhana gamana kara tadera kache, yebhabe allaha tomaderake hukuma diyechena. Niscaya'i allaha ta'obakari ebam apabitrata theke yara bemce thake taderake pachanda karena.
